description:
Throughout history, many Heroes have received support from the Kingdom on their journeys. This is because the Hero serves as a means of resisting the Demon Lord`s forces, but also because the Hero then acts as a powerful advertisement of the Royal Family`s authority to their people. 
Thus, the Hero and the Royal Family become inseparable, and so the Princess of Naral Island`s Royal Family appeared before Yusha`s party as well.
Now, what was it that she hoped to achieved with her visit? 
(Excerpt from "A Statesman`s Guide to the Merits and Demerits of Supporting the Hero")
Source: crunchyroll
